branchCategory.name: EX260 - Output Only
branchCategory.description: <p>EX260 series is a compact and cost effective fieldbus solution for output applicable to SMC's most popular directional control valves such as New SY, SV, VQC, and S0700 Series. It can control up to 32 solenoids in one manifold. Available protocols are EtherNet/IP&trade;, Profinet<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">®</span>, EtherCAT<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">®</span>, PROFIBUS DP<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">®</span>, DeviceNet&trade; and CC-Link. EX260 series has standard dual port connectivity to eliminate the need of switches or branch connector, reducing wiring and component cost. IP67 enclosure rating ensures protection against dust and washdown environment.</p>
